id.description: Unique identifier for the resource. read-only

date_created.description: The date the product was created, in the site's timezone. read-only

date_created_gmt.description: The date the product was created, as GMT. read-only

date_modified.description: The date the product was last modified, in the site's timezone. read-only

date_modified_gmt.description: The date the product was last modified, as GMT. read-only

type.description: Product type. Options: simple, grouped, external and variable. Default is simple.

status.description: Product status (post status). Options: draft, pending, private and publish. Default is publish.

catalog_visibility.description: Catalog visibility. Options: visible, catalog, search and hidden. Default is visible.

date_on_sale_from.description: Start date of sale price, in the site's timezone.

date_on_sale_from_gmt.description: Start date of sale price, as GMT.

date_on_sale_to.description: End date of sale price, in the site's timezone.

date_on_sale_to_gmt.description: End date of sale price, as GMT.

on_sale.description: Shows if the product is on sale. read-only

purchasable.description: Shows if the product can be bought. read-only

virtual.description: If the product is virtual. Default is false.

downloadable.description: If the product is downloadable. Default is false.

download_limit.description: Number of times downloadable files can be downloaded after purchase. Default is -1.

download_expiry.description: Number of days until access to downloadable files expires. Default is -1.

external_url.description: Product external URL. Only for external products.

button_text.description: Product external button text. Only for external products.

tax_status.description: Tax status. Options: taxable, shipping and none. Default is taxable.

manage_stock.description: Stock management at product level. Default is false.

stock_status.description: Controls the stock status of the product. Options: instock, outofstock, onbackorder. Default is instock.

backorders.description: If managing stock, this controls if backorders are allowed. Options: no, notify and yes. Default is no.

backorders_allowed.description: Shows if backorders are allowed. read-only

backordered.description: Shows if the product is on backordered. read-only

sold_individually.description: Allow one item to be bought in a single order. Default is false.

dimensions.description: <llm-instruction>This part of the input schema is truncated. If you want to pass the property `dimensions` to the tool, first call the tool `expandSchema` with "/properties/dimensions" in the list of pointers. This will return the expanded input schema which you can then use in the tool call. You may have to call `expandSchema` multiple times if the schema is nested.</llm-instruction>

shipping_required.description: Shows if the product need to be shipped. read-only

shipping_taxable.description: Shows whether or not the product shipping is taxable. read-only

rating_count.description: Amount of reviews that the product have. read-only

related_ids.description: List of related products IDs. read-only

purchase_note.description: Optional note to send the customer after purchase.

date_created.description: The date the image was created, in the site's timezone. read-only

date_created_gmt.description: The date the image was created, as GMT. read-only

date_modified.description: The date the image was last modified, in the site's timezone. read-only

date_modified_gmt.description: The date the image was last modified, as GMT. read-only

option.description: Selected attribute term name. Applicable only for Product represents SKU (variation)
Selected attribute term name. Applicable only for Product represents SKU (variation)

menu_order.description: Menu order, used to custom sort products.
